multiple_choice_question.text: What is the first step in the back-reaction calculation for the 0-0D coupled oscillator system?
choices: Calculate the resonant frequency of the coupled system.
Determine the damping coefficients for each oscillator.
Solve for the steady-state motion of the forced oscillator without coupling.
Calculate the amplitude of the forcing function.

multiple_choice_question.text: Why is the back-reaction calculation used in the 0-0D model?
choices: It provides a simpler alternative to solving the full coupled equations of motion.
It accurately predicts the behavior of the system even with strong coupling.
It is the only method for determining the resonant frequency of the coupled system.
It allows for the calculation of damping coefficients in the absence of experimental data.
